trace_id.title: TraceId is the identifier for a trace.
trace_id.description: TraceId is a 16 randomly generated bytes used to group all spans for a specific trace together across all processes.

span_id.title: SpanId is the identifier for a span.
span_id.description: It is globally unique, 8 randomly generated bytes representing an operation within a transaction.

type.title: Message type
type.description: Object message type used for serialization and deserialization.
